attributes.action: Petition the Government to grant a Knighthood to Kevin Sinfield !
attributes.additional_details: Because if anyone does deserve a knighthood it is Mr Kevin Sinfield due to his tireless charity work and the love he has shown to his late friend and team mate Rob Burrow.
attributes.background: Due to Mr Sinfields devotion to raising awareness and Funds for Motor Neurone Disease it is high time he was rewarded with the highest award possible.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
